attrHueShift.name: hue_shift
attrHueShift.label: hue shift
attrHueShift.comment: shifts the hue of the input (360 rolls over back to 0)

attrSaturationFactor.name: saturation_factor
attrSaturationFactor.label: saturation factor
attrSaturationFactor.comment: multiplies the saturation of the input

attrSaturationContrast.name: saturation_contrast
attrSaturationContrast.label: saturation contrast
attrSaturationContrast.comment: modifies the contrast of the input's saturation (-1, 1)

attrSaturationShift.name: saturation_shift
attrSaturationShift.label: saturation shift
attrSaturationShift.comment: shifts the saturation of the input (-1, 1)

attrValueFactor.name: value_factor
attrValueFactor.label: value factor
attrValueFactor.comment: multiplies the value of the input

attrValueContrast.name: value_contrast
attrValueContrast.label: value contrast
attrValueContrast.comment: modifies the contrast of the input's value (-1, 1)

attrValueShift.name: value_shift
attrValueShift.label: value shift
attrValueShift.comment: shifts the value of the input (-1, 1)
